1525640.name: The Build And Race Hotrod Game
1525640.description:
Build and race a hotrod car, use a truck and forklift to pick up parts from a waiting train. Drive on narrow and demanding mountain roads
Pick up parts with a crain and assemble the hotrod in a workshop located on the top of a mountain.Using the crain the parts must be moved to the correct position
on the chassie .Drive the hotrod car to the raceway on a timelimit.Be aware of unexpexted happenings when the russian mafia is trying to stop you from
entering the race.At the raceway you must race against other cars in a demanding 5 lap race.planed. updates every mounth will add new levels or make the game more fun by adding ideas from developer or wishes from the public.
1525640.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
